column1: #text=After looking for a bus route to my workplace online , I headed outside .
#text=The nearest bus stop was only about a block or two away so I walked over .
#text=There were two bus stops at the same intersection , one on either side of the road .
#text=I made sure I was at the right stop by reading the stop location id listed on the sign next to the bus stop .
#text=My bus arrived in about five minutes and I got on board .
#text=I waited until I got to the rider before taking out my wallet , and quickly paid the exact fee for a one day , unlimited bus pass .
#text=After receiving the pass , I walked inside the bus and looked for the nearest , open seat .
#text=I found one close to the back of the bus .
#text=Since my stop was a common one , I did n't have to let the bus driver know when I needed to get off .
#text=Once we arrived at my stop , me and several others all got off and went our separate ways .
